name: Berserker Rage
description:
Overall concept is that the main character is a type of berserker warrior and any  attacks build up rage. The rage then effect other stats like speed and damage(other things like damage resistance in the future). The rage bar is constantly depleting but can have a portion consumed to heal the player. The general idea is to reward the player for playing aggressive like a berserker.

A solo project, my first game jam where I have done any programming.
